pages.title: Tiger Rump Tarantula
pages.text: Davus fasciatus, commonly known as the Costa Rican tiger rump, is a species of a new-world tarantula native to Costa Rica.

pages.title: Tiger Rump Tarantula
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★☆☆☆$(br2)Always active$(br2)1 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:chicken$(br2)Number of Offspring: 4$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
